title: Ticket #4046: condor_q -userlog -af should not show totals
description:
when -af is used in combination with the -userlog argument with condor_q, two incorrect lines follow the correct output - a blank line, and a totals line.

The blank line and totals should be suppressed when -af is used.

The following example of incorrect output is from bbockelm, note the 2 extra lines after the correct data. 

    $ condor_q -userlog job_log.12 -af RemoteWallClockTime
    300.000000
    300.000000
    163.000000
    348.000000


    4 jobs; 4 completed, 0 removed, 0 idle, 0 running, 0 held, 0 suspended
remarks:
2013-Nov-05 13:44:06 by tim:
Duplicate of #4045
